prompts: Create a Bug-type Pokemon that resembles a mushroom and has a crab-like appearance.
Imagine a forest-dwelling Pokemon with a red cap and yellow pincers lurking in the grass.
Generate a small insect-like creature that has an unusual blend of mushroom features and claws.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a parasitic mushroom with striking red colors.
Show me a unique Pokemon that combines elements of fungi and crustaceans in its design.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats and has vibrant colors and distinct claws.
Give me a creature that has a round body, red coloration, and a penchant for hiding.
